events.name: The Orange Hive: Creative Concoction (OH Huddle)
events.description:
It’s a holiday season! What better way to celebrate than to gather creative minds to design dishes for all to enjoy? Have fun ideating, cooking/making/blending and most importantly eating!

This December, we’ll be holding a potluck design challenge... you bring 3 ingredients, then combine it with other surprise ingredients to create something unique to your team.

RSVP here: http://tinyurl.com/OHhuddleDec

-Design challenge goals will be revealed day of.
-Bring 3 ingredients (fruit, veggie, herbs, grain, bread, meat, seasoning, sauce, etc)
-Final team dish can be cooked, or not. 
-Stoves, Blender, Steamer are provided. 
-If you have some special kitchen weapon, feel free to bring along.

Whether you’re expert at cooking or not, you’re all welcome. All you need is a pair of clean hands and a creative mind!

Venue: near Bugis MRT 
(Address to be sent after confirmation)

Time: 10.30am - 12.30pm

Sounds like fun? We’re opening this huddle to 16 people, RSVP here: http://tinyurl.com/OHhuddleDec
